languages.text: "Даже не знаю, что обиднее — то, что меня уже комиссовали, или что перепутали флотского офицера с гвардейским расходником".
"I am not even sure which offends me more: your invaliding me or your mistaking me, an officer of the Navy, for an expendable Guardsman."
languages.original_text: "Даже не знаю, что обиднее — то, что меня уже комиссовали, или что перепутали флотского офицера с гвардейским расходником".

traits.locale_text: "I am not even sure which offends me more: your invaliding me out or your mistaking me, an officer of the Navy, for an expendable guardsman."
"I am not even sure which offends me more: your invaliding me out or your mistaking me, an officer of the Navy, for an expendable guardsman."
"I am not even sure which offends me more: your invaliding me or your mistaking me, an officer of the Navy, for an expendable guardsman."
"I am not even sure which offends me more: your invaliding me or your mistaking me, an officer of the Navy, for an expendable guardsman."
"I am not even sure which offends me more: your invaliding me or your mistaking me, an officer of the Navy, for an expendable Guardsman."
"I am not even sure which offends me more: your invaliding me or your mistaking me, an officer of the Navy, for an expendable Guardsman."

languages.text: «No sé si me ofende más que me invalide o que me confunda a mí, un oficial de la Armada, con un soldado prescindible de la Guardia».
languages.original_text: "I am not even sure which offends me more: your invaliding me or your mistaking me, an officer of the Navy, for an expendable Guardsman."

traits.locale_text: «No sé si me ofende más que me invalide o que me confunda a mí, un oficial de la Armada, con un soldado prescindible de la Guardia».

languages.text: “我说不好哪一点更让我觉得冒犯——是你把我贬成了残废，还是你把我这个帝国海军军官当成了可以随意牺牲的帝国卫队士兵。”
languages.original_text: "I am not even sure which offends me more: your invaliding me or your mistaking me, an officer of the Navy, for an expendable Guardsman."

traits.locale_text: “我说不好哪一点更让我觉得冒犯——是你把我贬成了残废，还是你把我这个帝国海军军官当成了可以随意牺牲的帝国卫队士兵。”

languages.text: 「どうしたらこれ以上私を侮辱できるか思いつかない。海軍の士官である私を認証できていないか、使い捨てのガーズマンと間違えている」
languages.original_text: "I am not even sure which offends me more: your invaliding me or your mistaking me, an officer of the Navy, for an expendable Guardsman."

traits.locale_text: 「どうしたらこれ以上私を侮辱できるか思いつかない。海軍の士官である私を認証できていないか、使い捨てのガーズマンと間違えている」

languages.text: « Je ne sais même pas ce qui m'offense le plus : que vous me traitiez de vieillard invalide ou que vous me confondiez, moi, un officier de la Marine, avec un simple garde. »
languages.original_text: "I am not even sure which offends me more: your invaliding me or your mistaking me, an officer of the Navy, for an expendable Guardsman."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne sais même pas ce qui m'offense le plus : que vous me traitiez de vieillard invalide ou que vous me confondiez, moi, un officier de la Marine, avec un simple garde. »

languages.text: "Hangisi beni daha çok rencide etti emin değilim... Beni malul sayman mı yoksa beni, bir Donanma subayını kullanıp atabileceğin bir Muhafız eriyle bir tutman mı..."
languages.original_text: "I am not even sure which offends me more: your invaliding me or your mistaking me, an officer of the Navy, for an expendable Guardsman."

traits.locale_text: "Hangisi beni daha çok rencide etti emin değilim... Beni malul sayman mı yoksa beni, bir Donanma subayını kullanıp atabileceğin bir Muhafız eriyle bir tutman mı..."

languages.text: "Ich weiß nicht, was mich mehr beleidigt. Dass Ihr mich zum Invaliden macht oder dass Ihr mich, einen Offizier der Flotte, für einen ersetzbaren Gardisten haltet."
languages.original_text: "I am not even sure which offends me more: your invaliding me or your mistaking me, an officer of the Navy, for an expendable Guardsman."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß nicht, was mich mehr beleidigt. Dass Ihr mich zum Invaliden macht oder dass Ihr mich, einen Offizier der Flotte, für einen ersetzbaren Gardisten haltet."
